summary: I know this is a reach (but i’m still desperately trying to somehow connect theon to the trailer lol) but do you guys think it’s...
body: I know this is a reach (but i’m still desperately trying to somehow connect theon to the trailer lol) but do you guys think it’s possible that it’s theon bran is talking to? think about it: “Everything you’ve done has led you here, where you belong; home” most people think he’s saying it to jon but why would he be? jon doesn’t need to be “led” home, he’s already lived there and considered it his home his whole life. if theon were to make it back to winterfell, i would 100% expect there to be a scene with him and bran, and this quote could be a reference to his acceptance into the stark family?? the “everything you’ve done” thing just makes me think of him okay think about it

summary: It’s been confirmed that Bran is going to be much less robotic this season, Arya is going have a conflict between her drive to...
body: It’s been confirmed that Bran is going to be much less robotic this season, Arya is going have a conflict between her drive to murder everyone who did her family wrong and her humanness (she will choose her humanness) and that Sansa is going to becoming a leader in her own rights. House Stark is finally going to be done right this season, and we’re going to get everything we deserve and so much more. I’m so glad that the writers finally realized that house Stark matters because I was tired of seeing them be mistreated, dehumanized and relocated to the side by the writers.

No need to know the nAme. 
Swoon and marvel at simple things.
LOST defined life. Live in the Enchanted Forest. Love what happens in Westeros. Wish you could hang out in Rosewood with some pretty little liars. Agonize over the events in Beacon Hills. And so on. Unconditional Cut & Run, Titanic and LOTR lover. 
Proud Princess Aurora, Sansa Stark and Alison Dilaurentis supporter.

summary: Character placements during the Battle for the Dawn
body:
Character placements during the Battle for the Dawn

Ok now that we have actual footage of the Battle for the Dawn, let’s place everyone during this Long Night that will kill us all (and many of them)

Characters seen fighting during the Battle :

  • Arya (halls and courtyard)
  • Jon (courtyard)
  • Jaime (ramparts/battlements)
  • Brienne (open field and ramparts/battlements)
  • Pod (open field and ramparts/battlements)
  • Jorah (open field)
  • Greyworm (likely off to open field)
  • Davos (ramparts)

Characters seen elsewhere during the Battle :

  • Varys (in the crypts)
  • Gilly (in the crypts)
  • Missandei (kissing Greyworm goodbye)
  • Sandor

Characters with unknown whereabouts during the Battle :

  • Sansa
  • Daenerys
  • Tyrion
  • Bran
  • Sam (but known at some point to wield a sword)
  • Drogon and Rhaegal

Characters whose participation is unsure :

  • Edd
  • Tormund
  • Beric
  • Theon
  • Gendry

The focus was clearly on the action as the warriors were all showcased. Analyzing the sequencing, we can conclude that after the first part of the battle outside the walls of Winterfell, the characters will retreat on the ramparts/battlements and the courtyard - meaning Jaime, Pod and Brienne survive the first wave. Jorah and Greyworm on the other hand, the show clearly leaves their fates in the balance.

And for other characters - Sansa, Bran, Dany - however, the secret is still not out as to where they can be and what they will be doing during the battle. Begs the question whether that’s deliberately not shown because they are involved in important stuff of their own… Sansa may not be involved in the fighting itself but she will definitely have been participating in the strategy of defense. Tyrion maybe as well. And Bran and Dany have their role to play against the Night King…

blog.name: theroguerises
blog.title: The Rogue Rises
blog.description: I reblog whatever I want, whenever I want.

summary: Rose of Red Lake — sansa seeing the unsullied/dothraki & the dragons...
body:
Had to turn my brightness hella up to see that trailer

How do I turn up the brightness on my tv before the season starts?

1. Kidnap plot is definitely real as many have noticed.

2. The first scenes of Arya running through the halls, she’s probably in King’s Landing helping Jon save Sansa. I don’t think it’s the crypts but it could be. I’m offering an alternative.

3. That VO of Jon’s last line about the enemy and how it cuts to Cersei drinking wine, a deterrent. We thought and Jon thinks the true enemy is the Night King or Cersei. Nah fam, it’s Dark!Dany.

4. Where is Ghost? I don’t want no damn dragons. I want Ghost. Or is he looking for Nymeria and Co.?

5. Gendry is alive thank God and making Dragonglass weapons. I need my Gendrya reunion.

6. I didn’t see Davos in the trailer am I blind?

7. Sansa “looking out” after Jon and Daenerys scene wow poetic cinema love triangle angst tears I’m not ready for it

8. Sansa is saying something during her close up. I don’t know what it is but if ain’t “Jon please” then I don’t want it

9. Jaime redemption arc fully achieved. This man is dying or living as a hero. His page from Westeros’ Greatest Knights will be filled.

10. So before I thought that Jon and Bran would be alone talking about his parentage. But I’m pretty sure Jon is there and Sam opens the door for him, hence Sam taking that look towards the back left. Bran is speaking to Jon and thankfully RoboBran will be gone. It’s the beginning of Bran returning to his Starkness. Pretty sure when he says Jon belongs at home, he means it. Jon won’t believe it and then Sansa will reassure him in the Godswood

11. So Dany? Well she’s kind of just there. She’s not riding on a dragon. Smart but that doesn’t mean much WHEN THERE ARE TWO FIRE BREATHING DRAGONS FLYING OVER WINTERFELL. THE NORTH IS SCARED AND HAS TOO MANY THINGS TO WORRY ABOUT AND NOW THEY GOTTA WORRY ABOUT THESE HUGE ASS LIZARDS FUCK THAT and once again emphasis on the smallfolk’s reaction to the dragons is too familiar. Hopefully they only die by white walkers and not by dragon fire. Or they don’t die at all.

12. Jon is the center of the trailer and I can’t believe he is that beautiful. Jon baby you’re doing amazing sweetie. Please keep playing the game. All will be well in the end.

13. Sansa is stunning. Most beautiful queen on the block. She is stunting on these hoes. Another post I saw and I’ll tag it when I see it again but it’s on how Sansa clearly saw the Dothraki, Unsullied, and dragons and still have Dany the death glare. SANSA YOURE DOING AMAZING SWEETIE KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK http://rose-of-red-lake.tumblr.com/post/183245174388/sansa-seeing-the-unsullieddothraki-the-dragons

Rose of Red Lake — sansa seeing the unsullied/dothraki & the dragons…

14. Someone save Brienne and Podrick. Why are they not protecting Sansa???? Kidnap plot for sure.

15. Cersei is iconic because I, too, would not give a fuck about anyone else if I were in her position

Overall, we got to see some minor characters that we didn’t see on the EW covers or character posters. I’m glad. I think the only thing that made me mad in terms of the plot is Dâenerys in the crypts. She should not be in there. I can imagine Tyrion or Jorah warning her that it is for STARKS ONLY, and she says “It’s my kingdom, I’ll go wherever Iplease.”

Obviously the trailer doesn’t say much to someone in the GA but certain things can’t be overlooked.

But I’m pretty sure Jon is there and Sam opens the door for him, hence Sam taking that look towards the back left. Bran is speaking to Jon and thankfully RoboBran will be gone. It’s the beginning of Bran returning to his Starkness. Pretty sure when he says Jon belongs at home, he means it. Jon won’t believe it and then Sansa will reassure him in the Godswood

11. So Dany? Well she’s kind of just there. She’s not riding on a dragon. Smart but that doesn’t mean much WHEN THERE ARE TWO FIRE BREATHING DRAGONS FLYING OVER WINTERFELL. THE NORTH IS SCARED AND HAS TOO MANY THINGS TO WORRY ABOUT AND NOW THEY GOTTA WORRY ABOUT THESE HUGE ASS LIZARDS FUCK THAT and once again emphasis on the smallfolk’s reaction to the dragons is too familiar. Hopefully they only die by white walkers and not by dragon fire. Or they don’t die at all.

12. Jon is the center of the trailer and I can’t believe he is that beautiful. Jon baby you’re doing amazing sweetie. Please keep playing the game. All will be well in the end.

13. Sansa is stunning. Most beautiful queen on the block. She is stunting on these hoes. Another post I saw and I’ll tag it when I see it again but it’s on how Sansa clearly saw the Dothraki, Unsullied, and dragons and still have Dany the death glare. SANSA YOURE DOING AMAZING SWEETIE KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK http://rose-of-red-lake.tumblr.com/post/183245174388/sansa-seeing-the-unsullieddothraki-the-dragons

Rose of Red Lake — sansa seeing the unsullied/dothraki & the dragons…

14. Someone save Brienne and Podrick. Why are they not protecting Sansa???? Kidnap plot for sure.

15. Cersei is iconic because I, too, would not give a fuck about anyone else if I were in her position

Overall, we got to see some minor characters that we didn’t see on the EW covers or character posters. I’m glad. I think the only thing that made me mad in terms of the plot is Dâenerys in the crypts. She should not be in there. I can imagine Tyrion or Jorah warning her that it is for STARKS ONLY, and she says “It’s my kingdom, I’ll go wherever Iplease.”

Obviously the trailer doesn’t say much to someone in the GA but certain things can’t be overlooked.

trail.content_raw:
Had to turn my brightness hella up to see that trailer

How do I turn up the brightness on my tv before the season starts?

1. Kidnap plot is definitely real as many have noticed.

2. The first scenes of Arya running through the halls, she’s probably in King’s Landing helping Jon save Sansa. I don’t think it’s the crypts but it could be. I’m offering an alternative.

3. That VO of Jon’s last line about the enemy and how it cuts to Cersei drinking wine, a deterrent. We thought and Jon thinks the true enemy is the Night King or Cersei. Nah fam, it’s Dark!Dany.

4. Where is Ghost? I don’t want no damn dragons. I want Ghost. Or is he looking for Nymeria and Co.?

5. Gendry is alive thank God and making Dragonglass weapons. I need my Gendrya reunion.

6. I didn’t see Davos in the trailer am I blind?

7. Sansa “looking out” after Jon and Daenerys scene wow poetic cinema love triangle angst tears I’m not ready for it

8. Sansa is saying something during her close up. I don’t know what it is but if ain’t “Jon please” then I don’t want it

9. Jaime redemption arc fully achieved. This man is dying or living as a hero. His page from Westeros’ Greatest Knights will be filled.

I can imagine Tyrion or Jorah warning her that it is for STARKS ONLY, and she says “It’s my kingdom, I’ll go wherever Iplease.”

Obviously the trailer doesn’t say much to someone in the GA but certain things can’t be overlooked.

summary: i think Arya is talking to Bran in the trailer and Brans voice is talking back to her, I have a feeling this is their dialogue....
body:
i think Arya is talking to Bran in the trailer and Brans voice is talking back to her, I have a feeling this is their dialogue.

Arya: “I know death. It’s got many faces. I look forward to seeing this one.”

Bran: “…Everything you did, but be where you are now. Where you belong…home.” (kinda unsure about what he says here)

I could be totally wrong tho

blog.name: clevercloudpoetry
blog.title: Gendrya is Canon!
blog.description: She/her. Way too many Fandoms and way too many OTPs. I like to think I'm funny. My blog is a mess but it's most of the things I like so... I sometimes make edits and write, not great at either of those things but trying to be better. Multifandom Blog.
